Pocatello.KMGI (FM):
KMGI (102.5 FM) is a commercial radio station located in Pocatello, Idaho. KMGI was the first classic rock station in Idaho.
KMGI was acquired in 2014 by Idaho Wireless Corporation, and on November 16, 2014 KMGI returned to its true heritage as a classic rock station as "The Rock of Idaho, Magik 102.5".
